00028 #include "RandomCellKiller.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 template<unsigned DIM>
00032 RandomCellKiller<DIM>::RandomCellKiller(AbstractTissue<DIM>* pTissue, double probabilityOfDeathInAnHour)
00033         : AbstractCellKiller<DIM>(pTissue),
00034           mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour(probabilityOfDeathInAnHour)
00035 {
00036     if ((mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour<0) || (mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour>1))
00037     {
00038         EXCEPTION("Probability of death must be between zero and one");
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 template<unsigned DIM>
00043 double RandomCellKiller<DIM>::GetDeathProbabilityInAnHour() const
00044 {
00045     return mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour;
00046 }
00047 
00048 template<unsigned DIM>
00049 void RandomCellKiller<DIM>::TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(TissueCell& rCell)
00050 {
00051     // We assume a constant time step
00052     double death_prob_this_timestep = 1.0 - pow((1.0 - mProbabilityOfDeathInAnHour), SimulationTime::Instance()->GetTimeStep());
00053 
00054     if (!rCell.HasApoptosisBegun() &&
00055         RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->ranf() < death_prob_this_timestep)
00056     {
00057         rCell.StartApoptosis();
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 template<unsigned DIM>
00062 void RandomCellKiller<DIM>::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00063 {
00064     for (typename AbstractTissue<DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpTissue->Begin();
00065          cell_iter != this->mpTissue->End();
00066          ++cell_iter)
00067     {
00068         TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(*cell_iter);
00069     }
00070 }
00071

00074 // Explicit instantiation

00077 template class RandomCellKiller<1>;
00078 template class RandomCellKiller<2>;
00079 template class RandomCellKiller<3>;
